about.title: About Tee Rex & Associates
about.desc1: At Tee Rex & Associates, we combine expertise with a personalized approach to accounting and business advisory services. Our team of certified professionals is dedicated to helping your business achieve financial success.
about.desc2: Having served businesses across multiple industries, we understand the unique challenges and opportunities that come with financial management in today's dynamic business environment.
about.desc3: Our mission is to provide clear, strategic financial guidance that empowers businesses to make informed decisions and achieve their goals.

services.title: Our Tax Filing & Accounting Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive tax filing and accounting solutions tailored to your specific needs
services.deadline: When is the deadline for filing this form?
services.deadlineAnswer: The filing deadline depends on your business structure. For most individual taxpayers, the deadline is April 30th following the tax year. For companies, it's 7 months after the close of the accounting period.
services.documents: What documents do I need to provide?
services.documentsAnswer: You'll need to provide income statements, expense receipts, previous tax returns, business financial statements, and any relevant supporting documentation for deductions or credits you're claiming.
services.timeProcess: How long does the process take?
services.timeProcessAnswer: The processing time varies depending on the complexity of your tax situation. Generally, we complete most tax filings within 1-2 weeks after receiving all necessary documentation.
services.contactForService: Contact us today to schedule a consultation about your service needs.

formBEM.title: Tax Filing - Form BE, E, M
formBEM.description: Professional assistance with filing BE, E, and M forms, ensuring accurate submission and compliance with tax regulations for individuals and businesses.

details.heading: Form BE (For Self-Employed Individuals)
details.content: Form BE is for resident individuals with business income sources. Our professional tax service ensures your Form BE is accurately completed and submitted on time, maximizing eligible deductions while maintaining full compliance with Malaysian tax law.

details.heading: Form E (For Employees)
details.content: Form E is the Employer's Return of Remuneration, which must be submitted by every employer with employees in Malaysia. We help businesses accurately prepare and submit Form E to ensure compliance with employment tax regulations.

details.heading: Form M (For Non-Residents)
details.content: Form M applies to non-resident individuals with Malaysian-sourced income. Our tax experts understand the complexities of international taxation and can help navigate the specific requirements for non-residents.

benefits: Maximization of tax deductions and reliefs
Compliance with latest tax regulations
Minimization of penalties and audit risks
Professional handling of complex tax situations
E-filing for faster processing
process: Initial consultation to understand your financial situation
Collection and organization of all relevant financial documents
Identification of applicable deductions and tax credits
Preparation and verification of tax forms
E-filing with LHDN
Post-submission support and representation
formBEM.pricing: Starting from RM 50, depending on complexity

formP.title: Tax Filing - Form P
formP.description: Professional assistance with filing Form P, ensuring compliance with tax regulations and accurate submission for partnerships and other entities.

details.heading: Partnership Income Declaration
details.content: Form P is designed for partnerships to report their business income and allocation of profits or losses to the respective partners. Our professional tax advisors ensure accurate distribution of partnership income among partners and proper documentation of all business deductions.

details.heading: Partnership Tax Compliance
details.content: We help partnerships understand and fulfill their tax obligations, ensuring that all income is properly declared and that partnership agreements are appropriately reflected in tax filings.

benefits: Accurate allocation of partnership profits and losses
Proper documentation of partner contributions and distributions
Strategic tax planning for partnerships
Compliance with partnership tax regulations
Minimizing tax burden through legal optimization
process: Review of partnership agreement and structure
Detailed analysis of partnership income and expenditure
Allocation of income and losses according to partnership interests
Preparation and verification of Form P
E-filing with tax authorities
Coordination of individual partner tax filings
formP.pricing: Starting from RM 150, based on partnership complexity and number of partners

formB.title: Tax Filing - Form B
formB.description: Professional assistance with filing Form B for sole proprietors and partnerships, ensuring accurate submission and compliance with tax regulations.

details.heading: Business Income Reporting
details.content: Form B is for resident individuals with business income, including sole proprietors, partnership partners, and freelancers. Our comprehensive Form B filing service ensures all business income and expenses are accurately reported while maximizing legitimate deductions.

details.heading: Self-Employment Tax Management
details.content: We provide expertise in handling the unique tax situations faced by self-employed individuals, including proper categorization of expenses, home office deductions, and depreciation of business assets.

benefits: Comprehensive business expense deductions
Accurate reporting of income from multiple business sources
Strategic tax planning for business owners
Proper documentation to support claimed deductions
Guidance on estimated tax payments and planning
process: Business financial review and analysis
Categorization and verification of business expenses
Income calculation and documentation
Identification of applicable business deductions
Preparation and submission of Form B
Year-round tax planning and consultation
formB.pricing: Starting from RM 50, depending on business size and complexity

formBAccount.title: Form B Account Management
formBAccount.description: Professional management of Form B accounts, ensuring compliance with tax regulations and accurate financial reporting for sole proprietors and partnerships.

details.heading: Financial Statement Preparation
details.content: We prepare comprehensive financial statements for your business that comply with accounting standards and clearly show your business's financial health. These statements serve as the foundation for accurate Form B submission.

details.heading: Accounting and Financial Management
details.content: Our account management services include year-round bookkeeping, expense tracking, revenue recognition, and financial analysis, ensuring your business records are always accurate and ready for tax filing.

details.heading: Business Advisory Services
details.content: In addition to managing your Form B accounts, we provide valuable business insights, profitability analysis, and financial planning to help your business grow and optimize its tax position.

benefits: Real-time financial visibility for better business decisions
Well-maintained financial records that stand up to scrutiny
Reduced tax preparation time and costs
Early identification of tax-saving opportunities
Professionally prepared financial statements for financing applications
Year-round tax and financial planning support
process: Initial financial system setup and organization
Regular bookkeeping and transaction categorization
Quarterly financial statement preparation and review
Ongoing tax planning and consultation
Year-end financial statement preparation
Form B preparation based on managed financial records
formBAccount.pricing: Starting from RM 300, based on transaction volume and business complexity

formCPT.title: Form C, Form PT
formCPT.description: Comprehensive assistance with filing Form C and Form PT, ensuring compliance with corporate tax regulations and accurate submission for companies.

details.heading: Corporate Tax Filing (Form C)
details.content: Form C is for companies registered in Malaysia. Our corporate tax specialists ensure accurate preparation and submission of Form C, including proper treatment of business income, capital allowances, and tax incentives applicable to your industry.

details.heading: Petroleum Tax Filing (Form PT)
details.content: Form PT is designed for companies engaged in petroleum operations. We have specialized expertise in managing the complex tax regulations for the petroleum industry, ensuring full compliance with industry-specific requirements.

details.heading: Corporate Tax Planning
details.content: We work proactively with our corporate clients to implement tax-efficient structures, identify applicable tax incentives, and develop strategies to minimize tax burden while maintaining full compliance.

benefits: Professional handling of complex corporate tax matters
Industry-specific tax knowledge and incentive identification
Strategic corporate tax planning and optimization
Compliance with corporate filing requirements
Representation during corporate tax audits
Reduced risk of penalties and compliance issues
process: Comprehensive review of corporate financial statements
Analysis of tax provisions and applicable incentives
Calculation of capital allowances and tax adjustments
Preparation and verification of Form C or Form PT
E-filing with the Inland Revenue Board
Corporate tax planning for future periods
formCPT.pricing: Determined based on company size and complexity

about.title: About Tee Rex & Associates
about.subtitle: Expert accounting and financial services designed to help businesses succeed
about.storyPart1: Founded in 2023, Tee Rex & Associates began with a simple mission: to provide businesses with clear, strategic financial guidance that empowers informed decision-making and sustainable growth.
about.storyPart2: What started as a small practice has grown into a trusted financial partner for businesses across various industries. Our growth stems from our unwavering commitment to personalized service and technical excellence.
about.storyPart3: Today, Tee Rex & Associates continues to uphold these founding principles while adapting to the ever-changing financial landscape and embracing innovative technologies to better serve our clients.
about.valuesSubtitle: These principles guide everything we do and shape the way we serve our clients
about.integrityDesc: We uphold the highest ethical standards in all our dealings, providing honest advice and maintaining confidentiality of client information.
about.clientFocusDesc: We prioritize understanding each client's unique needs and goals, crafting personalized solutions that align with their specific circumstances.
about.excellenceDesc: We strive for excellence in all aspects of our service, continuously improving our knowledge, processes, and client experience.
about.teamSubtitle: Our team of certified professionals brings expertise and dedication to every client engagement
about.founderDesc: With over 20 years of experience, Sarah leads our team with expertise in complex tax matters and business advisory.
about.taxDirectorDesc: Darren specializes in corporate tax planning and compliance, helping businesses optimize their tax positions.
about.accountingManagerDesc: Jessica oversees our accounting services, ensuring accurate financial reporting and insightful business analysis.
about.step1Desc: We begin by listening carefully to understand your unique business context, goals, and challenges.
about.step2Desc: Our team develops customized strategies and solutions aligned with your specific requirements and objectives.
about.step3Desc: We execute with precision, ensuring all financial and tax matters are handled accurately and efficiently.
about.step4Desc: We provide continuous guidance, keeping you updated on relevant changes and helping you adapt as needed.
about.credentialsSubtitle: Our team maintains the highest professional standards through ongoing education and certification
about.readyToWorkDesc: Let's discuss how our professional services can help your business succeed

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.subtitle: Build your career with Tee Rex & Associates, where talent meets opportunity
careers.whyJoinSubtitle: We offer a supportive environment where you can grow professionally while making a meaningful impact
careers.profGrowthDesc: Ongoing training, mentorship, and opportunities to expand your skills and expertise in accounting and finance.
careers.collabCultureDesc: Work with a talented team that values collaboration, mutual respect, and innovation in solving complex financial challenges.
careers.clientImpactDesc: Make a real difference by helping businesses thrive through strategic financial guidance and expertise.
careers.cultureDesc1: At Tee Rex & Associates, we foster a culture of excellence, integrity, and continuous learning. We believe that our people are our greatest asset, and we invest in their professional development and well-being.
careers.cultureDesc2: Our team enjoys a supportive work environment that encourages innovation, collaboration, and work-life balance. We celebrate diversity and believe that different perspectives drive better solutions for our clients.
careers.howApplySubtitle: We're always looking for talented individuals to join our team
careers.step1Desc: Send your resume and cover letter to our recruitment team
careers.step1Details: Please include the position you're interested in within the subject line.
careers.step2Desc: Our recruitment team will review your application and reach out to qualified candidates for interviews. The process typically includes an initial phone screening followed by in-person or virtual interviews.
careers.step3Desc: Successful candidates will receive an offer to join our team. We look forward to welcoming new talent who share our values and commitment to excellence.
careers.nextStep: Ready to Take the Next Step?
careers.nextStepDesc: Email your resume and cover letter today to explore career opportunities with Tee Rex & Associates
